sentences.sContent: It is a misconception that Peggy was fabulously wealthy.
sentences.sCn: 说佩吉以前极其富有，这是一个错误的看法。

remMethod.val: mis(错误， 坏) + conception(观念， 概念) → 误解； 错误想法

trans.tranCn: 误解； 错误想法； 错误印象
trans.tranOther: an idea which is wrong or untrue, but which people believe because they do not understand the subject properly
